trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Representa dados de progresso relatados em uma operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe contém propriedades que descrevem o andamento para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: Não todas as propriedades desta classe se aplica a cada evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A>representam o número total de bytes baixados para data e o número total de bytes na operação de download, respectivamente; elas se aplicam a todos os três eventos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>nomes de grupo de arquivos correspondente ao atual <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>evento, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>reflete o estágio atual da operação de download.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bytes já baixados por essa operação.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesCompleted property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade BytesCompleted refere-se para o download do manifesto de implantação.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se para o andamento do download de toda a atualização, incluído os arquivos de dados, assemblies e manifestos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao andamento do download de todo o conjunto de arquivos que fazem parte de um grupo nomeado.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que representa os dados já transferidos, em bytes.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de bytes na operação de download.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesTotal property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade BytesTotal refere-se para o download do manifesto de implantação.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se para o andamento do download de toda a atualização, incluído os arquivos de dados, assemblies e manifestos.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao andamento do download de todo o conjunto de arquivos que fazem parte de um grupo nomeado.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int64>que representa o tamanho total do download, em bytes.</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo de arquivos que estão sendo baixado.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Você pode iniciar várias chamadas para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>e baixar vários grupos de arquivos simultaneamente.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use Group to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: Usar o grupo para determinar quais retornos de chamada do evento corresponde a qual grupo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome do grupo de arquivos, se o evento ocorreu como resultado de uma chamada para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; caso contrário, uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ação que o processo está em execução atualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"></xref> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"> </xref> valor, indicando que o elemento ou elementos a operação está baixando.
